q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.controllers

Class PTNFileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.controllers.PTNFileController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PTNIFileListener

    public class PTNFileController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PTNIFileListener
    Basic class to read from PNML files or write in those files. Handles the file dialog windows. This class has a file read and a file write model.
    Author:
    8388415 - Massimiliano Brero
    See Also:
    PTNFileReader

    • Method Detail

      • writeToFile

        public int writeToFile(PTNNet net)
        File listener method. Calls writeFileDialog()
        Specified by:
        writeToFile in interface PTNIFileListener
        Returns:
        int Returns 0 if everything went smoothly.

      • readFromFile

        public void readFromFile(PTNNet net)
        File listener method. Calls read method in file model. So views do not really have to know the file model. And we do not need to make a model a listener. If there was an error while reading the method will stop the reading process.
        Specified by:
        readFromFile in interface PTNIFileListener
